Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory199.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: "I've been waiting for you.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'I apologize for hindering you from achieving your purpose.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Miss Luna wishes for this, so please understand.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'We are not the same as we were in Kowloong.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'You might not be able to stop us this time.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Is that so? Regrettably, I, am not the same as well.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Like Roland, Gabriel's words echo and distort in everyone's communication channel."}
{3: "Only, Gabriel's words are more potent than Roland's, and the whispers—accompanied by howls—echo in everyone's M.I.N.D."}
{3: 'Unable to bear the noise of info flooding out of the channel, everyone can do nothing but stabilize themselves.'}
{3: 'Gabriel moves. Camu recovers due to his previous experience and reacts to Gabriel, but it was already too late.'}
{3: 'Gabriel captures you.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryRedSmoke.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'What folly. Humankind is forever bringing about its own destruction.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Even if you eradicate the Punishing Virus in the foreseeable future, these Constructs, your shieldbearers, will still be discarded like pairs of worn-out shoes.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: "This is Miss Luna's will, so please understand.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Humans are the epitome of absurdity. You do not even realize what the Punishing Virus really is.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'You begin to suffocate. Everything begins turning black and white.'}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Of course, I bear no innate hatred for humans themselves.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryRedSmoke.prefab', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBlackSmoke.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'You are pitiful beings to be eliminated by the Punishing Virus sooner or later.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'When the dust settles... Only those... under the protection of the Ascension-Network... will survive...', 4: '2'}
{3: "Darkness begins to eat away your field of vision, and even Gabriel's words, spoken right before you, begin to sound distant."}
{3: 'This is... your end...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Hah, you look pretty miserable.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Do it like we planned.'}
{3: "Four grenades explode above Gabriel's head."}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: 'Pathetic!'}
{2: '???', 3: "Wasn't targeting you! Dumbass!"}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryHit.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'A flash cuts past you, bringing light into your world.'}
{3: 'Even the echoes in your ears dissipate.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory199.png'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBlackSmoke.prefab', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'Can you get yourself up?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You try to respond by standing up, but your arms and legs are unresponsive, as if they were stripped of their bones.'}
{3: 'The shadow in front of you leans down and flips you over.'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'You might not feel any pain just yet, but, a word of warning—Get ready. You will, now.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The shadow pulls out a rod-like object and stabs you hard in the chest.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory199.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Enough noise. Hurry up and get your medics here to clean up the mess.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'I jabbed the Commandant with a shot of standard adrenaline. Else, 【kuroname】 would have been dead in ten minutes.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Your medics have CPR devices, yeah? You go get 【kuroname】 breathing.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Hello? I don't have human-use CPR devices on me. I'm not kidding.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: '...Why did you help us?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Why did I help 【kuroname】? That was just a side dish.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'This one here... is our main course.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg1301_1.jpg'}
{3: 'Vera pulls out her blade and points it at Gabriel, who has already recovered from the shockwave of the grenades.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Sorry, big guy. I know it's your boss lady's orders. But I've got a job to do as well, boyo—and that's sending you to hell."}
{2: 'Gabriel', 3: '...Fool.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Alright, then. Guess you're okay with me doing my job."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Just a warning, but try making a move on another one around here, and I'll cut your head off from behind."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Ah, and no need to thank me. I'm a good executioner."}
{3: 'Wordlessly, Gabriel moves along with Vera, and the two slowly edge into battle.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Good. Thank you for your cooperation. Happy killing.'}
